Meditation.name: 4-4-4 Breathing
Meditation.description: Take 4 seconds to INHALE (through your nose). HOLD your inhale at the top for 4 seconds. Take 4 seconds to EXHALE (through your mouth)

Meditation.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
Meditation.description: Next, close your lips, inhaling silently through your nose as you count to four in your head. Then, for seven seconds, hold your breath. Make another whooshing exhale from your mouth for eight seconds.

Meditation.name: Walking Meditation
Meditation.description: Have you tried to medidate while walking?

Meditation.name: Body Scan Meditation
Meditation.description: The body scan meditation is an exercice that allows you to tune out distractions while focusing on various areas of the body

Meditation.name: Progresive Muscle Relaxation
Meditation.description: Progressive muscle relaxation is a simple exercise where you tense and release all the muscles in your body, working your way up from the feet and toes to the head

Meditation.name: Visualization Meditation
Meditation.description: Visualization is a beautiful way to calm and relax the body, it can also help you sleep

Meditation.name: Blackboard Meditation
Meditation.description: Counting is another good way to help you fall asleep. The blackboard technique involves writing numbers down on a chalkboard and then erasing them in your mind.

Meditation.name: Focused Meditation
Meditation.description: Focused meditation is a technique where you choose to focus on something like an object with solitary intent. You would focus on this object to the exclusion of all other things

Meditation.name: Gratitude Meditation
Meditation.description: Gratitude Meditation is a practice where you reflect on all the gifts in your life. As you experience positive emotions like gratitude, loving-kindness, and compassion, your awareness broadens, and your creativity and problem-solving capacities expand

Meditation.name: Conscious Observation
Meditation.description: Pick up an object you have lying around. Any object will do. Hold the object in your hands and allow your attention to be fully absorbed by the object. If you are holding a coffee mug, notice how it feels in your hands. Don’t over-analyze it either, allow yourself to be present in the moment

Meditation.name: Transcendental Meditation
Meditation.description: Transcendental meditation is a meditation technique that is designed to help you increase your awareness, and it can also help you avoid thoughts that may be distracting

Walking.name: New
Walking.description: Go walking to a place you have not been before

Walking.name: Errand
Walking.description: Do an errand you wouldn't have normally done by walking

Walking.name: Walk with Friends
Walking.description: Go on a walk with friends that you have not seen in a while

Socializing.description: Get to know a new person

Socializing.name: Old Acquaintance
Socializing.description: Get back in touch with someone who used to be your friend or acquaintance

Socializing.name: Eat with a friend
Socializing.description: Meet up with a friend that you have not seen in a while

Socializing.name: Walk with Friends
Socializing.description: Go on a walk with friends that you have not seen in a while

Drawing.name: Draw Yourself
Drawing.description: Draw yourself using a photo or a mirror for reference

Drawing.name: Bicicle
Drawing.description: Draw a bicicle either realistically or in a fun way

Drawing.name: Dragon
Drawing.description: Draw a dragon with a knight, a chinese dragon or a friendly dragon

Drawing.name: Family Member
Drawing.description: Draw a family member using either a photo or them as a model

Drawing.name: Feather
Drawing.description: Draw a feather, you can draw it either with great detail or in an icon style

Drawing.name: Fashion Sketch
Drawing.description: Come up with your own fashion designs or take inspiration from some of the leading fashion designers to create your own fashion sketches

Drawing.name: Alien
Drawing.description: The best part about aliens as a drawing idea? You can make them look like almost anything your imagination can think of, since it is very rare to actually see them in real-life

Drawing.name: Pirate Ship
Drawing.description: Ahoy Matey! Pirate ships are a great thing to draw in your sketchbook and can be realistic or make your own cartoon

Drawing.name: Butterfly
Drawing.description: There are so many different kinds of beautiful butterflies you could draw, such as monarchs or swallowtail butterflies

Drawing.name: Super Hero
Drawing.description: It's a bird, it's a plane…it's super man! Draw one of your favorite super heroes or create your own!

Drawing.name: Dinosaur
Drawing.description: Dinosaur…roar! Draw a T-rex, a brontosaurus, a triceratops, pterodactyl or a velociraptor if you wish – there are so many great dinosaurs to choose from as sketchbook inspiration!

Drawing.name: Web Icons
Drawing.description: Web icons have become so common place we see them everywhere online. Sketch some icons for your favorite social media channels or visit a site like flaticon.com for inspiration!

Running.name: Mile PR
Running.description: Try to set a 1 mile personal record

Running.name: 5K PR
Running.description: Try to set a 5 Km personal record

Running.name: New Route
Running.description: Go running on a new route

Running.name: 5K, 10K, half marathon
Running.description: Run a 5K, a 10K and a half marathon in one month

Running.name: GPS Art
Running.description: Try to make a drawing using the GPS while running

Running.name: Trial Runnning
Running.description: Go running in a nearby trail

Running.name: Run With a Friend
Running.description: Running with a friend and try learning thing you didn't know about him

Running.name: Challenge Others
Running.description: Challenge someone to join you in a competition to see who can run the further in a week

Running.name: 30 Day Streak
Running.description: Run at least a mile every day for 30 days

Running.name: Uphill Running
Running.description: Running uphill helps you build speed and strength in tendons and joints

Coding.name: Learn Web Development
Coding.description:
Start your journey of becoming a web dev by learning frontend languages 
Gradually level up your skills by learning backend too.

Coding.name: Learn Python
Coding.description: New to programming? Well, Python being beginner-friendly might be the language of your choice.

Coding.name: Learn Angular 11
Coding.description: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript.

Coding.name: Build your own app
Coding.description: Build an app with any language of your choice.

Coding.name: Catch up with the tech trends
Coding.description: Technology trend awareness as a skill refers to being mindful of the technology that is recently becoming popular and is readily accepted in the market or industry.

Coding.name: Explore Blockchains
Coding.description: Blockchain is a shared, immutable ledger that facilitates the process of recording transactions and tracking assets in a business network.

Coding.name: Learn Data Science
Coding.description: Data science is the field of study that combines domain expertise, programming skills, and knowledge of mathematics and statistics to extract meaningful insights from data.

Gardening.name: Make a mini vegetable gaarden in your baclony
Gardening.description: A garden that exists to grow vegetables and other plants useful for human consumption

Gardening.name: Water your plants
Gardening.description: To prevent your plants from wilting in sun, they need plenty of water.

Gardening.name: Weeding
Gardening.description: reduce the risk of these pests infecting our desirable plants.

Gardening.name: Sowing new seeds
Gardening.description: Sow a new seed everyday in an attempt to contribute to the nature's beauty

Fitness.name: Catch up with the GYM
Fitness.description: Dramatically increase your chances of actually getting fit.

Fitness.name: Aerobics
Fitness.description: Increase your stamina, fitness and strength.

Fitness.name: Play any sport of your choice
Fitness.description: Reduce risk of obesity and feel the healthy growth of bones, muscles, ligaments and tendons.

Fitness.name: Athletics
Fitness.description: Exercise and sport triggers chemicals in the brain that can make you feel happier and relaxed.

Fitness.name: Go for a walk
Fitness.description: Prevent or manage various conditions, including heart disease, stroke, high blood pressure, cancer and type 2 diabetes.

Fitness.name: Heavy calisthenics
Fitness.description: Improves your mobility, reduce aches and pains, and decrease your risk for injury.

Fitness.name: Squats
Fitness.description: Increases lower body and core strength, as well as flexibility in your body.

Fitness.name: Lunges
Fitness.description: Promotes functional moveent, while also increasing the strength in your legs and glutes.

Fitness.name: Standing overhead dumbbell presses
Fitness.description: Compound exercise, which utilize multiple joints and muscle, are perfect for busy bees as they work several parts of yur body at once.

Fitness.name: Side planks
Fitness.description: Helps developing a strong healthy body.

Fitness.name: Planks
Fitness.description: An effective way to target both your abdominal muscles and your whole body.

Travelling.name: Visit a place in your city
Travelling.description: You don't need to go very far to find a place you have never been to, try to find a new interesting spot in your city

Travelling.name: Bike Tour
Travelling.description: Have you ever visited a city by bike? If you haven't, now is a great time to do it for the first time!

Travelling.name: Scuba Diving
Travelling.description: You might have visited lost of cities, but have you ever visited the dephts of the ocean?

Travelling.name: Zip Lining
Travelling.description: Zip lining is a great way to visit a place from another perspective!

Travelling.name: Virtual Tour
Travelling.description: You might have visited lots of places, but have you ever visited a non existent place?

Travelling.name: Another Perspective
Travelling.description: Visit a city that you have already visited but try to visit places that you have not visited before!

Travelling.name: Camping
Travelling.description: You may have visited lots of cities and stayed on lots of hotels, but have you tried camping on your own?

Travelling.name: Local Food
Travelling.description: Travelling is not only visiting new places but also discovering new experiences or flavors, make sure to try local food sometimes!

Biking.name: Bike Climbing
Biking.description: You surely have ridden your bike through lots of different places, but have you ever climbed a mountain? Go to your nearest mountain and find a route to climb it!

Biking.name: Bike Tour
Biking.description: Have you ever visited a city by bike? If you haven't, now is a great time to do it for the first time!

Biking.name: No car day
Biking.description: Today is a special day, that means that you will have to use your bike instead of using your car!

Biking.name: Mountain Biking
Biking.description: Riding a bike on a mountain is a great challenge to test some of your biking skills such as endurance and balance!

Biking.name: Virtual Biking
Biking.description: You might have ridden a bike through lots of different places, but have you ever ridden a bike in a virtual world?

Biking.name: Ride With Friends
Biking.description: Doing things with friends is way better than doing it on your own, ask some of your friends if they want to go on a ride with you!

Biking.name: Bike Route
Biking.description: Have you ever done a route by bike, if you haven't, this a great oportunity to do it!
